name: Combat Master
shortContent: Opponents gain no bonus for outnumbering the character in combat.
content:
The character's weapon seems to be everywhere at once,
keeping many more opponents at bay in close combat
than would seem possible. Opponents fighting the
character in hand-to-hand combat gain no bonuses for
outnumbering him.
extraSubCategories: Adeptus Astartes, may not be taken by characters with a Psy Rating
